CAND-001:
Q: Tell us about a challenging project.
A: I led a RAG pipeline where retrieval precision was initially low. I added hybrid reranking and improved chunking; precision@10 rose from 0.42 to 0.71.

Q: How do you handle disagreements?
A: I ask clarifying questions, propose a small experiment, and let data guide the decision. I document outcomes for transparency.

Q: Describe collaboration.
A: I run weekly tech huddles, pair program on tricky bugs, and keep notes public to reduce handoffs.
CAND-002: I improved CI/CD, cut build times by half, and introduced ADRs for architectural decisions. In conflicts, I prefer async proposals with pros/cons and getting consensus.
